page.title: 13SESSAY SOCIAL CLUB
page.content: {Sessay Village Hall}was built in 1971 with money raised by the villagers. The{Social Club}was added 4 years later. This has a licensed bar which is open every evening, staffed by volunteers. As well as the outdoor sports available one can take part in something different every evening - play Bridge, learn upholstery or try indoor bowling. The{Senior Citizens and{Women's Institute}meet monthly. {Playschool}is very well attended twice a week by under-5s. The enthusiastic {ladies darts team}plays each Wednesday with considerable success. Thursdays from September to April see the{Drama {Group}rehearsing a Christmas Show or a Spring Concert. Sessay's Village Hall and its full calendar of events are the envy of many surrounding villages, and one would find it difficult to live here without becoming involved.
